Package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.governanceaction

Interface GovernanceActionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GeneralGovernanceActionService, GenericElementWatchdogGovernanceActionConnector, GenericFolderWatchdogGovernanceActionConnector, GenericWatchdogGovernanceActionConnector, GovernanceActionServiceConnector, MoveCopyFileGovernanceActionConnector, OriginSeekerGovernanceActionConnector, ProvisioningGovernanceActionService, QualifiedNamePeerDuplicateGovernanceActionConnector, RemediationGovernanceActionService, TriageGovernanceActionService, VerificationGovernanceActionService, VerifyFileFolderGovernanceActionConnector, WatchdogGovernanceActionService, ZonePublisherGovernanceActionConnector
public interface GovernanceActionService
A marker interface to identify the service that this connector works with.
